item.title: Federal Judge Orders Trump Administration Not to Detain or Deport Another Columbia Student
item.description: Essentially, Yunseo Chung is free while Mahmoud Khalil is detained because she beat the government to the courthouse.

item.title: Securing the Seas Is Deeply American
item.description: Targeting the Houthis is not ‘bailing out Europe.’

item.title: Remembering the Free World, &c.
item.description: On a turn of history, boycotts of America, a Rogan guest, a math pioneer, an NBA legend, and more.

item.title: The Nondelegation Doctrine Returns to the Supreme Court
item.description: Can Congress give a private industry group an unlimited power to tax?

item.title: An M.I.A. Congress Exacerbates the Clash Between Trump and the Courts
item.description: Congress has to step up and take some responsibility for the shaping of public policy.
